# AssetBook (Pulse)

## Overview

| Field | Details |
|-------|---------|
| **Website** | [assetbook.com](https://www.assetbook.com/) |
| **Category** | Portfolio Management / Fee Billing / Performance Reporting Software |
| **Description** | AssetBook (Pulse) is a cloud-based portfolio management, fee billing, and performance reporting software designed for RIAs and wealth managers. The platform provides comprehensive portfolio monitoring, customizable reporting, fee billing automation, and client engagement tools. Pulse by AssetBook offers an open API architecture that integrates with leading CRM, trading/rebalancing, financial planning, and custodian platforms, making it a flexible solution for advisory firms of all sizes. |

---

## Pricing Tiers

| Tier | Name | Cost | Key Features |
|------|------|------|--------------|
| **Starter** | Growing Advisor | **Contact for pricing** | Basic portfolio management, limited accounts, standard reporting |
| **Standard** | Professional | **$43 per account/year** | Full portfolio management, fee billing, performance reporting, client portals |
| **Enterprise** | Institutional | **Custom pricing** | Advanced integrations, API access, custom reporting, dedicated support |

**Notes on Pricing:**
- **Retail price:** $43 per account per year (standard tier)
- **Volume discounts:** Breakpoints reduce per-account cost for firms with 500+ accounts
- **Growing Advisor Program:** Special pricing for new entrants to the field
- **No additional support costs:** Support included at no extra charge
- **Cloud-based:** SaaS model with monthly/annual subscription options
- **Account-based pricing:** Costs scale with number of client accounts

---

## Key Features

### Core Capabilities
- **Portfolio Management** - Comprehensive portfolio monitoring and analysis
- **Fee Billing Automation** - Automated RIA fee calculation and billing
- **Performance Reporting** - Customizable performance reports with client-ready formatting
- **Client Portals** - White-labeled portals for client access to reports and documents
- **Firm Dashboard** - Dynamic dashboard displaying key firm-level metrics

### Advanced Features
- **Custom Investment Classifications** - Create up to 4 levels of custom classifications
- **Model Portfolio Management** - Build and monitor model portfolios at any level
- **Interactive Digital Experience** - Customizable charts, graphs, and portfolio statistics
- **Document Management** - Transfer files and documents to clients
- **Tax Consideration Reporting** - Tax-aware performance reporting

### Enterprise-Only Features
- **Full API Access** - Open API for custom integrations
- **Custom Reporting** - Tailored reporting solutions
- **Advanced Integrations** - Deep integration with third-party platforms
- **Dedicated Support** - Enterprise-level customer success
- **White-Label Options** - Platform branding for larger institutions

---

## Add-On Products & Services

### Client Engagement Application
**What it does:** Enhanced client communication and engagement tools

**Key Features:**
- Interactive client portals
- Real-time portfolio updates
- Document sharing and collaboration
- Custom branded experience

**Pricing:** Included in platform subscription

**Use Cases:**
- Advisors wanting to enhance client communication
- Practices seeking to reduce support inquiries
- Firms building long-term client relationships

### Custom Investment Classifications
**What it does:** Flexible portfolio categorization and monitoring

**Key Features:**
- Up to 4 levels of custom classifications
- Flexible portfolio construction
- Enhanced monitoring capabilities
- Custom reporting at all levels

**Pricing:** Included in platform subscription

**Use Cases:**
- Advisors with complex portfolio structures
- Practices requiring custom reporting
- Firms with multiple investment strategies

### Firm-Level Dashboard
**What it does:** Real-time business metrics and analytics

**Key Features:**
- Key performance indicators (KPIs)
- Business intelligence insights
- Real-time monitoring
- Customizable metrics

**Pricing:** Included in platform subscription

**Use Cases:**
- Advisory firms monitoring business health
- Practices tracking growth metrics
- Firms needing operational visibility

## Integration Overview

**Total Integrations:** 100+ platforms across multiple categories

**Integration Types:**
- Native integrations (direct API connections)
- Open API architecture (custom integrations)
- Bi-directional data sync
- Single Sign-On (SSO) capabilities

**Key Integration Categories:**
- CRM Systems
- Trading/Rebalancing Platforms
- Financial Planning Software
- Custodian Platforms
- Data Aggregation Services

### Key Integrations

#### 1. Redtail CRM Integration
**Type:** Native integration (bi-directional)  
**Direction:** Bi-directional  
**What it does:** Seamless integration with Redtail CRM for contact management and data sync  
**Data Synced:** Client contacts, account data, relationship information  
**Setup Complexity:** Easy (pre-configured integration)  
**Limitations:** Requires Redtail CRM subscription  
**Documentation:** Available through AssetBook and Redtail

#### 2. MoneyGuidePro Integration
**Type:** Third-party integration  
**Direction:** One-way (data export to financial planning)  
**What it does:** Integrates with MoneyGuidePro for comprehensive financial planning workflows  
**Data Synced:** Portfolio data, account information, client profiles  
**Setup Complexity:** Medium (requires MoneyGuidePro subscription)  
**Limitations:** Separate platform required  
**Documentation:** Available through integration partners

#### 3. PlanTechHub Integration
**Type:** Third-party integration  
**Direction:** One-way (data export)  
**What it does:** Connects with PlanTechHub for planning workflows  
**Data Synced:** Financial planning data, client scenarios  
**Setup Complexity:** Medium (requires PlanTechHub subscription)  
**Limitations:** Separate platform required  
**Documentation:** Available through integration partners

#### 4. AdvisorPeak Integration
**Type:** Third-party integration  
**Direction:** One-way (data export)  
**What it does:** Integrates with AdvisorPeak for trading and rebalancing  
**Data Synced:** Portfolio data, account positions, trading instructions  
**Setup Complexity:** Medium (requires AdvisorPeak subscription)  
**Limitations:** Separate platform required  
**Documentation:** Available through integration partners

#### 5. Custodian Platform Integrations
**Type:** Native integration  
**Direction:** One-way (data access)  
**What it does:** Integrates with major custodians (Schwab, Fidelity, Pershing, etc.) for account data  
**Data Synced:** Account positions, transaction history, account details  
**Setup Complexity:** Easy (standard custodian integration)  
**Limitations:** Requires custodian relationships  
**Documentation:** Available through custodians and AssetBook

#### 6. Trading/Rebalancing Platforms
**Type:** Third-party integration  
**Direction:** One-way (data export for trading)  
**What it does:** Exports portfolio data to trading and rebalancing systems  
**Data Synced:** Account data, portfolio positions, trading parameters  
**Setup Complexity:** Medium (requires trading platform subscription)  
**Limitations:** Separate platform required  
**Documentation:** Available through trading platform providers

#### 7. Open API Integration
**Type:** REST API  
**Direction:** Bi-directional  
**What it does:** Custom integrations with proprietary systems and workflows  
**Data Synced:** Full data access based on API permissions  
**Setup Complexity:** Hard (requires development resources)  
**Limitations:** Enterprise tier required  
**Documentation:** Available through AssetBook API documentation

#### 8. Financial Planning Software Integration
**Type:** Third-party integration  
**Direction:** One-way (data export)  
**What it does:** Integrates with various financial planning software platforms  
**Data Synced:** Portfolio data, account information, client profiles  
**Setup Complexity:** Medium (requires planning software subscription)  
**Limitations:** Separate platform required  
**Documentation:** Available through planning software providers

#### 9. Data Aggregation Services
**Type:** Third-party integration  
**Direction:** One-way (data aggregation to AssetBook)  
**What it does:** Aggregates data from multiple sources into AssetBook  
**Data Synced:** Account data from multiple custodians and institutions  
**Setup Complexity:** Medium (requires aggregation service)  
**Limitations:** Separate aggregation service required  
**Documentation:** Available through aggregation providers

#### 10. Custom Integration Development
**Type:** Custom development  
**Direction:** Bi-directional  
**What it does:** Bespoke integrations for unique workflows and proprietary systems  
**Data Synced:** Custom data sets based on requirements  
**Setup Complexity:** Hard (requires development resources)  
**Limitations:** Requires enterprise agreement and development resources  
**Documentation:** Available through professional services

---

## Integration Types Available

- **Native integrations:** Redtail CRM, custodian platforms
- **Open API:** Full API for custom integrations
- **Webhook:** Available for real-time notifications
- **Third-party:** MoneyGuidePro, PlanTechHub, AdvisorPeak, trading platforms, aggregation services
- **Standard integrations:** 100+ pre-configured integrations

---

## Integration Categories

- **CRM Systems:** Redtail CRM, Salesforce (via API)
- **Trading/Rebalancing:** AdvisorPeak, various platforms
- **Financial Planning:** MoneyGuidePro, PlanTechHub, various platforms
- **Custodian Platforms:** Schwab, Fidelity, Pershing, Envestnet Orion
- **Data Aggregation:** Various aggregation services
- **Custom Systems:** Open API for proprietary integrations

---

## API & Developer Info

**API Availability:** Yes (Open API architecture)

**Developer Portal:** Available through AssetBook website and enterprise sales

**Authentication Methods:**
- API keys for custom integrations
- OAuth 2.0 for third-party apps
- SSO (SAML) for platform access

**Rate Limits:** Not publicly disclosed (contact for enterprise limits)

**API Documentation:** Available through AssetBook developer portal

**Webhook Support:** Yes for real-time notifications and updates

**API Cost:** Included in platform subscription (no separate API fees for standard integrations)

## Evaluation Notes

### Pros (5+ items)
1. **Competitive Pricing** - $43 per account/year is cost-competitive
2. **Volume Discounts** - Breakpoints reduce costs for larger firms
3. **Open API Architecture** - Flexible integration capabilities
4. **Comprehensive Reporting** - Customizable performance and compliance reports
5. **Client Portals** - White-labeled client engagement tools
6. **No Additional Support Costs** - Support included in subscription
7. **Growing Advisor Program** - Special pricing for new advisors
8. **Cloud-Based** - Accessible from anywhere, no on-premise infrastructure

### Cons (4+ items)
1. **Account-Based Pricing** - Costs scale with number of accounts
2. **Limited Public Information** - Some pricing details not fully documented
3. **Not a Full Planning Solution** - Portfolio management focus, not comprehensive planning
4. **API Access Limited** - Full API may require enterprise tier
5. **Integration Complexity** - Many integrations require separate subscriptions
6. **Competitive Market** - Many competitors in portfolio management space

### Alternatives
- **Orion Advisor Solutions:** Comprehensive portfolio management and reporting
- **Envestnet:** Portfolio management with financial planning
- **Black Diamond:** Portfolio management and reporting
- **Advent/SS&C:** Enterprise portfolio management
- **Tamarac:** Portfolio management (part of Envestnet)

### Use Cases

**Ideal For:**
- RIAs seeking cost-effective portfolio management
- Advisors needing customizable performance reporting
- Practices wanting client portal functionality
- Firms with 500+ accounts (volume discounts apply)
- Advisors requiring open API for custom integrations
- Practices wanting to automate fee billing

**Not Ideal For:**
- Advisors seeking comprehensive financial planning (separate tool needed)
- Firms not requiring portfolio management functionality
- Practices without trading/rebalancing needs
- Very small practices (account-based pricing may be high per account)
- Firms requiring full-service financial planning platform

### Key Differentiators

1. **Open API Architecture** - Flexible integration capabilities unlike closed platforms
2. **Competitive Pricing** - Cost-effective at $43/account/year
3. **Volume Discounts** - Breakpoints for 500+ accounts reduce costs
4. **Growing Advisor Program** - Special pricing for new entrants
5. **No Additional Support Costs** - Support included in subscription
6. **Client Portals** - White-labeled client engagement included
